attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I was SOOOOO excited to support my favorite president. Oh well, sadly have to delete this one. Which is really really disappointing.
attributes.title: So disappointed

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app so I could keep track of our president and the very next day someone from the Whitehouse came to my house and shoved worms in my mouth. Now I had a bad worm experience in my youth so this was very traumatic to me.  I suppose if you like worms you may appreciate this service but count me out. 

Therefore I am deleting this app and giving it a one star review.
attributes.title: Be careful
